meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cameron Kim Ben Juster Laurie Beckoff Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6772.

td.p: Cameron Kim, a senior at Duke University from Riverview, Florida
Ben Juster, a senior at UCLA from Woodland Hills, California
Laurie Beckoff, a sophomore from the University of Chicago from Hollis Hills, New York

tr.td: HARD TO DEFINE
RECENT TV
SOLVE FOR x
JUST A WORD BEFORE GOING
MINI
HA HA

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In March 2014 NYC\'s 92nd Street Y will use a 7-day program to define this (our try: a creatively brilliant person)')

tr.td: In March 2014 NYC's 92nd Street Y will use a 7-day program to define this (our try: a creatively brilliant person)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: It was a reference to a political event and I\'m sure all three of you came up with the correct response.)
...
(Alex: Four [*] referring to the reelection of President Obama.)
CameronWhat is more years?
$5,400
LaurieWhat is more years?
$5,200
BenWhat is more years?
$0
more years')

Laurie
Ben
Cameron

Laurie
Ben

(including 1 DD),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
